metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Create PDFs from Word mail merges

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Not all forms are fillable. Sometimes form creators don’t convert their PDFs to  interactive  fillable  forms. Or, they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand  or with the  Fill & Sign  tool. These non-interactive forms are called

•   Interactive forms : These contain fields that you can select and fill in.  •   Flat forms : These do  not have interactive fields. It could be a paper form or PDF that  hasn’t been optimized for form filling. The Fill & Sign tool automatically detects

You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the  Prepare Form  tool or  enabling the  Fill & Sign  tools. Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool  to fill in flat forms.  Interactive form   To create an interactive

An  interactive  form contains fields that you can select or fill in.    1.   If necessary, select either the  Hand Tool  or the  Select Tool  from the context menu of  the page (right-click on the page to open the context menu).     The pointer changes
You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types  of PDF forms

To complete and sign PDF forms, open the form in Acrobat and then select  E-Sign  from the  global bar. Alternatively, you can select  All tools  >   Fill & Sign .  It displays the Fill & Sign tools in the left pane. You can now fill in the form fields and

1.   Choose  Tools  >  Prepare a form . In the  Fields  side panel, choose  Clear Form  from the  Options menu    .    You can sign a document to attest to its contents or approve the document. This document  explains how to sign a document or agreement

1.   Select  Print this file    from the upper right.  2.   Choose an appropriate printer in the  Print  dialog box.  3.   In the  Comments And Forms  menu, choose one of the following, and then select  OK :     •   (Interactive or flat form) To print th
